titles.title: Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act
Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act
A bill to amend the Chesapeake Bay Initiative Act of 1998 to provide for the reauthorization of the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 112-139.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 305.

bill.summary: 1/26/2012--Reported to Senate without amendment. Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act - Amends the Chesapeake Bay Initiative Act of 1998 to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network through FY2016.
